Faculty - Enum Class in entity
An enumeration of all the faculties/schools in NTU PACE CoE CoHASS CoS GraduateCollege LKCMedicine NBS NIE RSIS ADM SBS CCEB CEE SCSE EEE SOH MSE MAE SPMS SSS ASE WKWSCI NTU The "NTU" option represents the entire school

G

generateReport(Camp, int, String, boolean) - Static method in class ReportController
Uses BufferedWriter and FileWriter to write to a .txt file The types of report for Staff and CommitteeMember are different CommitteeMember only generates report for that Camp he/she is in-charge-of, thus append mode of FileWriter is not used Staff can generate report for multiple Camps he/she has created, thus append mode of FileWriter is used Staff report also includes performance report which are all the points of all CommitteeMember of that camp, sorted in descending order

Creates and adds Reply to an Enquiry from a Camp

Allows Staff to create new Camp
menu_DisplayCampDetails(Camp) - Static method in class CommitteeUI
Displays all camp details of a Camp
menu_DisplayEnquiries(Camp) - Static method in class CommitteeUI
Displays all Enquirys of a Camp Also allows user to reply to an Enquiry via CommitteeUI.menu_ReplyEnquiry(Camp, Enquiry)
menu_DisplayMyEnquiries(Camp) - Static method in class StudentUI
Gets a list of Enquiry which current Student has made about a Camp Displays the list via DisplayHandler.displayResult(Enquiry) Allows Student to select more options via StudentUI.menu_ViewEnquiryOptions(Camp, Enquiry)
menu_DisplayMySuggestions(Camp) - Static method in class CommitteeUI
Gets all Suggestion of a Camp via SuggestionController.getMySuggestions(Camp) Displays Suggestions via DisplayHandler.displayResult(Suggestion) Allows CommitteeMember to select options for Suggestion via CommitteeUI.menu_ManageMySuggestions(Camp, Suggestion)
menu_DisplayOpenCamps(ArrayList<Camp>) - Static method in class StudentUI
Displays all Camps visible to Student and he/she fufils the criteria to SignUp Allows Student to select more options regarding a Camp via StudentUI.menu_ViewCampOptions(Camp)
menu_DisplayRegisteredCamps(ArrayList<Camp>) - Static method in class StudentUI
Displays a list of camps the Student has signed up for, as well as his/her role Role either as: Committee Member or Attendee Calls StudentUI.menu_ViewCampOptions(Camp) to display more options for a Camp
menu_EditMyCamp(Camp) - Static method in class StaffUI
Allows Staff to edit attributes of an existing Camp
menu_GenerateReport() - Static method in class StaffUI
Generates Staff report via ReportController.generateReport(Camp, int, String, boolean) Allow Staff to select whether to generate report for all Camps or filter some Camps Allows Staff to select filter to choose the order which the attendees and committee appears Calls StaffUI.menu_SearchForCamp() to filter Camp
menu_GenerateReport(Camp) - Static method in class CommitteeUI
Generates CommitteeMember report via ReportController.generateReport(Camp, int, String, boolean) CommitteeMember can only generate report for the Camp they are in-charge-of Allows CommitteeMember to select filter to choose the order which the attendees and committee appears
menu_ManageMyCamp(Camp) - Static method in class StaffUI
Displays more options for a Staff to see more about the Camp Calls StaffUI.menu_ViewSignUps(Camp) to see all the signups Calls StaffUI.menu_ViewEnquiries(Camp) to see all Enquirys Calls StaffUI.menu_ViewSuggestions(Camp) to see all Suggestions Calls StaffUI.menu_EditMyCamp(Camp) to edit an existing Camp Allows for deletion of Camp
menu_ManageMySuggestions(Camp, Suggestion) - Static method in class CommitteeUI
Allows CommitteeMember to edit or delete Suggestions which are still PENDING Calls SuggestionController.edit(Suggestion, String) and SuggestionController.delete(Camp, Suggestion)
menu_ReplyEnquiry(Camp, Enquiry) - Static method in class CommitteeUI
Creates and adds Reply to an Enquiry from a Camp
menu_SearchForCamp() - Static method in class StaffUI
Filters a camp by certain attributes and displays the search results through StaffUI.menu_ViewCamps(ArrayList) returns an ArrayList of Camp Attributes Camp name Camp start date Camp end date Camp faculty Camp location A certain Attendee A certain Committee member Calls SearchController methods for filtering
menu_SearchForCamp() - Static method in class StudentUI
Filters a camp by certain attributes and displays the search results through StudentUI.menu_DisplayOpenCamps(ArrayList) Attributes Camp name Camp start date Camp end date Camp faculty Camp location A certain Attendee A certain Committee member Calls SearchController methods for filtering
menu_SetSuggestionStatus(Suggestion) - Static method in class StaffUI
Sets status of Suggestion to APPROVED or REJECTED
menu_ViewCampOptions(Camp) - Static method in class StudentUI
Displays more options for a Student to see more about a Camp Calls CampController.registerAttendee(Camp) to register as attendee Calls CampController.registerCommittee(Camp) to register as committee Calls EnquiryController.post(entity.Camp, java.lang.String) to add an enquiry to a Camp even without registering Calls StudentUI.menu_DisplayMyEnquiries(Camp) to let Student manage past Enquirys about this Camp
menu_ViewCamps(ArrayList<Camp>) - Static method in class StaffUI
Displays a list of Camps and allows the user to select camps to navigate into each Camp to see more details
menu_ViewEnquiries(Camp) - Static method in class StaffUI
Displays all Enquirys of a Camp Also allows user to reply to an Enquiry via StaffUI.menu_AddReplyToEnquiry(Camp, Enquiry)
menu_ViewEnquiryOptions(Camp, Enquiry) - Static method in class StudentUI
Displays more options for an Enquiry For Student allows for edit and delete of Enquiry via EnquiryController.edit(Enquiry, String) and EnquiryController.delete(Camp, Enquiry) For CommitteeMember allows for reply of Enquiry via CommitteeUI.menu_ReplyEnquiry(Camp, Enquiry)
menu_ViewMyCamps() - Static method in class StaffUI
Allows Staff to see list of Camps created Allows navigation into each Camp to see more options via StaffUI.menu_ManageMyCamp(Camp)
menu_ViewSignUps(Camp) - Static method in class StaffUI
Displays all attendees and committee member of a Camp as well as their roles
menu_ViewSuggestions(Camp) - Static method in class StaffUI
Displays all Suggestion of a Camp Allows Staff to set status of Suggestion to APPROVED or REJECTED via StaffUI.menu_SetSuggestionStatus(Suggestion)
menu_WithdrawRegisteredCamps() - Static method in class StudentUI
Displays a list of Camps the Student has signed up for from CampController.getSignedUpCamps() Allows withdraw from a Camp only if he/she is not a committee member Calls CampController.removeAttendee(Camp) to perform withdrawl

R

regCloseDate - Variable in class Camp
 
register(Camp) - Method in class Student
Adds that camp to a list of camps the student is registered for
registerAttendee(Camp) - Static method in class CampController
Registers an attendee for a Camp by adding current User to the list Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data. Student or commitee member can only register if He/she is not in the blacklist, ie have not withdrew from this camp before He/she is not already an attendee He/she is not already a committee member This Camp's start and end date do not overlap with any of his/her existing camps
registerCommittee(Camp) - Static method in class CampController
Registers a committee member for a Camp Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data. can only register if He/she is not in the blacklist, ie have not withdrew from this camp before He/she is not already an attendee He/she is not already a committee member This Camp's start and end date do not overlap with any of his/her existing camps Also converts him/her from a Student to a CommitteeMember
reject() - Method in class Suggestion
Allows a Staff to reject the suggestion
reject(Suggestion) - Static method in class SuggestionController
Allows Staff to reject a Suggestion made by a CommitteeMember
REJECTED - Enum constant in enum class Status
 
removeAttendee(Camp) - Static method in class CampController
Removes an attendee from list of attendees of a Camp Also adds the attendee to a blacklist so he/she will not be able to register for this camp again Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data.
